SELECT a.* FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
SELECT ifmmSeq , ifmmID FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmID = #{ifmmID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE ifmmID = #{ifmmID}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE ifmmNickname = #{ifmmNickname}
